thread.title: Policemen & Detectives been kill

author: news24.com
title: Policemen & Detectives been kill
text:
This is really sad, we can’t let the crime in SA become like the American mafia that normally when a couple of detectives gets too close to uncover something so big that the bad guys will make an example of these detectives; This was over kill, come on 3 Golf GTi, 8 people against 2, that is a show of excessive force that the “King Pins” want to show not only to the police but to the public, that they don’t like anyone nosing around their business.
All the detectives and policemen no matter the branch should use all the time their bullet proof vest and carry some kind of powerful automatic weapon from the Israeli UZI to a foldable Assault Rifle on the back seat floor of every police vehicle, no matter if is not a proper police car, the police should be ready to retaliate with deadly force if their life’s are in danger; These two detectives could be alive today if their have any of this weapons, one will be driving the other will be shooting at these Golf GTi, a few shots in the radiator and the Golf will overheat 5 minutes later, then without a car to run away the hunters will be the hunted.
Please re use the old Bullet proof vest, simply take the inside Kevlar (damage or not) and cover the inside of the police car doors, armoured companies could provide the ceramic plate that will stop up to an AK47 bullet; This protection will give the policemen and detectives a few seconds of protection to allow them to run from any ambush.
Rest in peace,
Regrds:
Paul Mackena
